# Hide in Plain Sight
## Overview
*Hide in Plain Sight (Ex):* A rogue with this talent is a master of disappearance. She can use the [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] skill to hide even while being observed. The rogue must have a feat or skill specialty that grants a bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks and be at least 12th level before selecting this talent.

**Source:** Legendary Rogues (Legendary Games), pg. 12
